rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with welcoming vestibule. Designed with Vastu principles to ensure good energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Art Deco style living room with high ceilings and ambient lighting. Features large windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Modern dining area with art deco accents. Ample seating for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances, ample natural ventilation via windows.
rooms.lighting: Natural light from windows and LED lights

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with art deco design, private ensuite bathroom, and abundant natural lighting.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample storage and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy guest room adhering to traditional Indian aesthetics combined with art deco.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring space efficiency and comfort with natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom suitable for a child or guest, designed with bright colors and art deco accents.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym area within the ground floor featuring state-of-the-art fitness equipment, soundproof walls, and ample ventilation.
rooms.lighting: Natural light with enhanced artificial lighting

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for household utilities such as laundry, storage, and cleaning supplies.

openings.description: Grand double doors with art deco detailing, ensuring a welcoming entry.
Large casement windows for optimal natural light and cross ventilation.
Glass door leading to the rooftop terrace with a panoramic view of the garden.

additional_features.name: Large Garden
additional_features.description: Well-planned garden area featuring native plants, water features, and seating areas for relaxation.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: Private rooftop terrace designed for social gatherings, equipped with a pergola and outdoor seating, ensuring privacy and panoramic views.
